name: bunny hungry
description:
There's only one word that can adequately describe this bunny: hungry. The goal of each puzzle in bunny hungry is to rearrange the terrain so that the bunny has a safe path of grass and dirt to reach the food. Every time you place a piece of terrain, all the tiles interact with their neighbors in consistent ways—but you must discover those ways!

Key features:
  • 80 original 9-by-9 puzzles
  • mouse-based pick-and-place interface
  • more than 10 types of terrain to discover
  • original music, artwork, and sound effects
  • customizable bunny appearance and food types
  • unlock-able level editor
  • optional move counter
  • discord server for community, support, and sharing custom levels
